title: Jordan Paul: one teacher's approach
creator_credit: Vaughn Ohern, Gary Schlosser and Extension Media Centre
brief_description: Jordan Paul’s approach to the drug problem is to relate to his students, by any means he can, in order to communicate about drug abuse. His approach is non-directive, he has problems to over come as an authority figure, but he promotes the substitution of people as an alternative to drugs. High school students discuss aspects of drug education.
